rules_text: For each player, exile up to one target creature that player controls. Return each creature exiled this way under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: [i]Magali was the first of the Erkinder to visit Zwiewald, and would live there for many years. The locals, initially wary, grew to enjoy her company, as well as her tales of distant seas.[/i]
